Guess just still have my uti even after a week of abx n that and dehydration was causing contractions. But unfortunately I got diagnosed with mild preeclampsia : ( have to turn in a 24 hr urine collection tmrw, then Wednesday follow up with my doctor!

question: I think I'm in early labor... my contractions have been ranging 6-10 minutes apart 30 sec to 1 min long for 2.5 hrs now and I called the on call doctor who said I have to wait till they're consistently 5 min apart. I wish I could go in now so I would know if its real labor or not! Tmi had 3 loose stools tonight, having nausea, decided to do laundry at 3 am cuz I can't sleep! Dull back pain following the contractions. Any experienced mommys that can give me their opinion!?
title: early labor
